product_name: SmartWool Split Stripe Socks - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The lightweight SmartWool Split Stripe Socks are your go-to dress socks for business trips or special occasions. They offer maximum breathability with mesh ventilation panels. Made from soft merino wool blended with nylon, these socks wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry and cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Elastane stretch delivers all-day comfort and helps keep socks in place. SmartWool Fit System provides a great fit with 2 supportive bands around the arch and the ankle of the sock. WOW(TM) Technology (wool-on-wool) maximizes the amount of wool against the skin for excellent comfort. Strategic mesh zones promote ventilation; socks are machine washable. Closeout.
short_description: The lightweight SmartWool Split Stripe Socks are your go-to dress socks for business trips or special occasions. They offer maximum breathability with mesh ventilation panels.
